name: House Of Quandary (Windows 64-bit)
description:
Story: You have entered the House Of Quandary, where you are greeted by the Puzzle Master. Your task is to solve all of the Puzzle Master's games. If you run out of time, or fail to enter your inputs correctly, the game will start over. Learn from your mistakes to become successful.

Controls: Left-Mouse Button

Credits: 
Daniel Manoiu (@gno-evenimente): Programming, Music and Puzzle Design
Sage Fremont (@SageWare): Programming, Order of Operations, and Art Design
